Package network.events

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UpdateEvent
    An UpdateEvent is an event that can be queued to be sent to a player.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreateLocalPlayerEvent
    Event for creating the local player on a client
    CreatePlayerEvent
    Event for creating a remote player on a client
    EndGameEvent
    Sent to a player when the game has ended
    FreezePlayerEvent
    Freezes the player specified by the id
    InvalidPlayerEvent
    Sent if the player has given invalid player information when joining
    ItemEvent
    This class contains code for writing items to an OutputStream
    LocationEvent
    This class contains code for writing locations to an OutputStream
    MoveEvent
    Sends a position update for a player to a client
    PickUpItemEvent
    adds an item to a players inventory
    PlaceItemEvent
    Adds an item at a location
    RemoveFromContainerEvent
    Removes an item from a container
    RemoveFromInventoryEvent
    removes an item from the players inventory
    RemoveItemEvent
    Removes an item from a location
    RemovePlayerEvent
    removes a player from the client sent when a player disconnects
    SendMapEvent
    Sent to a player when they request the map
    TurnEvent
    sent to the client when a player turns
    UnfreezePlayerEvent
    Sent when a player is unfrozen
    UnlockEvent
    Sent when a door is unlocked
    UpdateHealthEvent
    Sent when the local player on a client's health changes
    UpdateProjectilePositionsEvent
    Sent when projectiles need to be updated, contains the new location of all the projectiles on the map
    UpdateScoreEvent
    Sent when a client needs it's score updated
    UpdateTimeEvent
    sent when the time needs to be updated
    ValidPlayerEvent
    sent if a players selected name and team is valid
